decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (14/345/VFRH/104, dated September 2014, received 23/09/2014; 14/345/VFRH/103 Rev A, dated September 2014, received 07/11/2014; Design and Access Statement, undated, received 25/09/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until the secure storage area to house refuse as shown on the approved drawings has been made permanently available and no waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the designated area.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no change of use to a Use Class outside of A1 (as defined by The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987) shall take place without the expressed consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the shop
